mapper.select: select id, module_id, title, content, img_url, link_url, price, tel, area_id, area_name, island_id, island_name, valid, big_img_url, small_img_url, link_obligate, price_big, price_small, FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time, '%Y%m$%d') as create_time, create_person, upd_time, upd_person, type_id, type_name, view_link, recommend_index from recommend where module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and valid=1 order by recommend_index
